content: this pattern contains written instructions to crochet a pair of textured fingerless gloves in two adult sizes these chunky mittens have a wonderful texture keeping your hands warm while your fingers are free for typing texting or crocheting the pattern works up quickly in the round and requires no sewing of individual pieces requires i hook j hook and approximately 125-150 yards of medium weight 4 yarn this pattern was updated with additional size options on 1/14/2019 please note that this blog is no longer maintained and there are no plans to update this pattern in the future the following correction addresses an error in row 8 directing that you stitch into the blo instead of the 3rd loop row 8 chain 2 working in 3rd loop half_double_crochet in the next 5 7 9 stitches 2 half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop of the next 6 stitches half_double_crochet in the remaining 12 14 16 stitches in blo join 30 34 38 should read row 8 chain 2 working in 3rd loop half_double_crochet in the next 5 7 9 stitches 2 half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop of the next 6 stitches half_double_crochet in the remaining 12 14 16 stitches in 3rd loop join 30 34 38
